name: Star Cores
description:
This is a simple game where you get to explore our solar system and visit planets. This was made in one day as part of a one day project I have been doing recently. Expect to see more one day projects appear on Itch

My goal was to create a game in space where you could fly a shop around that included yaw, pitch, variable speeds and the ability to visit giant sized planets. Obviously these planets are not to scale but they are all relative is size.

Controls are...
W = Pitch Down
S = Pitch Up
A = Turn Left
S = Turn Right
Q = Yaw Left
E = Yaw Right
Left Shift = Thrust
Left CTRL = Slow Down
